steps.name: Given I am on the Amazon homepage
When I search for " Apple laptop"
And I select the first item in the search results
And I add the item to the wishlist
And I login with valid credentials "9061532115"
Then again i should click on wishList

steps.name: Then the item should be visible in wishlist and click on viewList
